title: Partnering with Alpha Customer Financing Guarantees an Enhanced Consumer Base
text:
Roswell, Georgia (prbuzz) August 25, 2015 - As an enterprise dedicated to helping businesses boost sales, Alpha Customer Financing Solutions has years of experience in extending consumer loans. The program is an excellent option for businesses that are willing to accept a little less money for services or products in exchange for instant cash.
With an automated system that never sleeps, Alpha Customer Financing caters to a wide variety of businesses. From travel club membership, Medical Financing, Automotive, Veterinary, furniture, electronics, scooters, appliances, mattresses and a host of other organizations. Since the enterprise offers financing without recourse , the lender takes responsibility to get paid by the buyer. This is in all cases other than those of fraud. Merchants benefit from no responsibility to repay the financing, which helps them to concentrate on and boosting sales. Impressing clients with no setup fee and zero monthly charge, the experts at Alpha Customer Financing offer credit card processing to high risk industries as well.
"Our goal is creating a solid and consistent customer financing solution for your business. Every business is unique, but most have the same recurring problem- their customer needs to finance his purchases. Remember that whatever you take as a down payment is 100% yours. There is no discount on the money you have received directly, so try offering financing for a month at your next four presentations. You will be glad you have this extra weapon at your side," says a company spokesperson Lloyd Katz.
Additionally, Alpha funds patient procedures of all types such as Lasik, Cosmetic Surgery, Dental Implants and more with medical treatment financing . With a far-reaching service, the experts cater to the construction industry helping companies come out of economic recession. Alpha Customer Financing helps both contractors and consumers with funds for all kinds of home improvements, both planned and emergency situations.
The consumer loan services offered to people with a low credit score, let merchants advertise the financing which encourages buyers to call. By letting merchants give a customer's details in a live interactive application, the company offers a response in less than 5 minutes.
Since Alpha Customer Financing is available all day, all year and round the clock, merchants or practices can have no better partner.
About Alpha Customer Financing Solutions
Alpha Customer Financing Solutions empowers merchants to create a new base of customers that result in an improved bottom line and additional profits. To know more, visit http://www.alphacustomerfinancing.com/
